item.title: 代理公司 Glass Lewis 与 ISS 联合呼吁投票反对马斯克 1 万亿美元的薪酬方案
item.description: 代理公司 Glass Lewis 建议特斯拉股东投票反对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拟议的 1 万亿美元薪酬计划，几天前，ISS 也敦促投资者否决可能是有史以来授予公司首席执行官的最大薪酬计划。【原文：Proxy firm Glass Lewis has recommended that Tesla shareholders vote against the proposed $1 trillion pay package for CEO Elon Musk, days after ISS also urged investors to reject what might be the largest-ever compensation plan awarded to a company chief.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州总检察长就儿童安全问题向 Roblox 发出传票
item.description: 佛罗里达州共和党总检察长詹姆斯-乌斯迈尔（James Uthmeier）说，他的办公室正在向 Roblox 公司发出刑事传票，称该视频游戏平台是 "掠夺者的温床"，会给儿童带来危险。【原文：Republican Florida Attorney General James Uthmeier said his office is issuing criminal subpoenas to Roblox Corp , calling the video gaming platform a "breeding ground for predators" that puts children at risk.】

item.title: 美国商业游说团敦促特朗普终止对华出口新限制措施
item.description: 一个董事会成员包括甲骨文公司、亚马逊公司和埃克森美孚公司等美国公司的游说团体正在敦促特朗普政府立即中止一项规定，该团体称这项规定导致价值数十亿美元的美国出口中断，并将促使中国和其他国家将美国公司从其供应链中剔除。【原文：A lobbying group whose board includes U.S. firms like Oracle , Amazon.com and Exxon Mobil is urging the Trump administration to immediately suspend a rule it says halted billions of dollars' worth of U.S. exports and will prompt China and other countries to drop U.S. firms from their supply chains.】

item.title: Netflix的广告和游戏赌注成为焦点，投资者寻求明确的回报率
item.description: Netflix 今年的股市涨幅高达 1200 亿美元，本周二它将面临一个关键的考验：证明其在广告和视频游戏领域的高成本投资能够支持增长，而正是这种增长让这家流媒体先驱成为华尔街的宠儿。【原文：Netflix's $120 billion stock market rally this year faces a crucial test on Tuesday: proving that its costly investments into advertising and video gaming can support the growth that made the streaming pioneer a Wall Street darling.】

item.title: 行动迅速的 de Meo 如何与欧莱雅达成交易，缓解开云集团的压力
item.description: Kering 新任首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）很快就崭露头角。【原文：Kering's new CEO Luca de Meo didn’t take long to make his mark.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算故障：在线服务受到冲击，恢复情况参差不齐
item.description: 周一，亚马逊云计算部门的故障逐渐缓解，此前，银行、社交媒体公司和企业提供的许多在线服务都受到了干扰。【原文：An outage at Amazon's cloud computing unit was gradually easing on Monday, after disrupting many online services offered by banks, social media companies and businesses.】

item.title: 加拿大对来自美国和中国的部分钢铁和铝产品实行关税减免
item.description: 一份政府文件显示，加拿大对从美国和中国进口的部分钢铁和铝产品提供了关税减免，以帮助受到贸易战两面夹击的国内企业。【原文：Canada offered tariff relief on some steel and aluminum products imported from the U.S. and China, a government document showed, in efforts to help domestic businesses battered by a trade war on two fronts.】

item.title: 法国阿托斯公司销售额下滑，目标从 2026 年开始并购
item.description: 法国 IT 集团 Atos 周一报告称，由于关键合同损失，该公司季度收入大幅下降，并表示从 2026 年起将仅以收购为目标。【原文：French IT group Atos reported a sharp drop in quarterly revenue on Monday, owing to key contract losses, and said it would only target acquisitions from 2026.】

item.title: 克罗格公司将在 2025 年假日季招聘 1.8 万名员工，比去年减少
item.description: 克罗格（Kroger）周一表示，随着美国食品杂货商为繁忙的假日季节做准备，其旗下公司正寻求招聘 18,000 多名员工，比去年减少约 7,000 人。【原文：Kroger said on Monday its family of companies are looking to hire over 18,000 associates as the U.S. grocer preps for the busy holiday season, about 7,000 fewer than last year.】

item.title: 一些分析师认为美联储即将因利率动荡而停止缩减资产负债表
item.description: 一些华尔街分析师现在认为，美联储将在本月底停止其长期以来缩减资产负债表的努力。【原文：Some Wall Street analysts now believe the Federal Reserve will pull the plug on its long-running effort to shrink its balance sheet at the end of the month.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 InvestorSight 与咨询公司 Longacre Square 宣布合作
item.description: 企业咨询公司 Longacre Square Partners 与人工智能初创公司 InvestorSight 建立了战略合作伙伴关系，为其客户提供人工智能工具，以评估投资者在收购和董事会争斗中的行为。【原文：Corporate advisory firm Longacre Square Partners has formed a strategic partnership with artificial intelligence startup InvestorSight to give its clients access to AI tools to assess investor behavior in takeovers and board fights.】

item.title: 10 月初墨西哥通胀可能放缓 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周一的一项民意调查显示，墨西哥的年通胀率在 10 月上半月可能有所放缓，这支持了拉美第二大经济体墨西哥央行将在今年年底前继续下调基准利率的赌注。【原文：Mexico's annual inflation rate likely slowed in the first half of October, a Reuters poll showed on Monday, supporting bets the central bank of Latin America's second-largest economy will continue to cut its benchmark interest rate through the end of this year.】

item.title: 数据显示 iPhone 需求强劲，苹果估值逼近 4 万亿美元 17
item.description: 由于数据显示最新款 iPhone 势头强劲，苹果股价周一飙升至历史新高，这家 iPhone 制造商接近成为第三家市场估值达到 4 万亿美元的公司。【原文：Apple shares surged to an all-time high on Monday, with the iPhone maker close to becoming the third company to hit a $4 trillion market valuation as data showed strong momentum for the latest iPhone.】

item.title: Zions 和 Western Alliance 不良贷款背后的投资者与 2.7 亿美元的问题债务有关
item.description: 法庭文件显示，在 Zions Bancorp 和 Western Alliance 披露的不良贷款背后，一位鲜为人知的加州房地产投资者也面临着加州银行和另外两家贷款机构的诉讼，他卷入的问题债务总额约为 2.7 亿美元。【原文：A little-known California real estate investor behind bad loans disclosed by Zions Bancorp and Western Alliance also faces lawsuits by Banc of California and two other lenders, with his involvement in troubled debt totaling around $270 million, court filings show.】

item.title: Kering 意大利工人因公司 "单方面决定 "举行罢工
item.description: 工会表示，法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）意大利分公司的工人将于周二举行四小时罢工，理由是该公司不愿就远程工作等问题进行对话。【原文：Workers at Italian units of French luxury group Kering will stage a four-hour strike on Tuesday, unions said, citing what they said was the company's unwillingness to engage in dialogue over issues such as remote working.】

item.title: 调查发现，巴西酒吧和餐馆销售额因饮料中毒事件而下降
item.description: 周一，支付公司 Stone 和巴西酒吧与餐馆协会 Abrasel 公布的数据显示，由于酒精饮料中甲醇污染事件日益增多，9 月份巴西酒吧和餐馆的销售额与 8 月份相比下降了 4.9%。【原文：Sales in Brazilian bars and restaurants dropped 4.9% in September compared to August amid growing cases of methanol contamination in alcoholic beverages, data released by payment company Stone and the Brazilian Association of Bars and Restaurants Abrasel showed on Monday.】

item.title: 绿色能源公司 DeepGreenX 在持续停产中终止直接上市计划
item.description: 绿色能源和技术公司 DeepGreenX 集团周一撤回了其在美国直接上市的注册声明，因为联邦政府关门已满 20 天。【原文：Green energy and technology company DeepGreenX Group withdrew its registration statement for a direct listing in the United States on Monday, as the federal government shutdown hit the 20-day mark.】

item.title: 加拿大银行称贸易紧张局势下企业前景依然低迷
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 阿里-伊曼纽尔的 MARI 收购数字票务平台 TodayTix
item.description: 全球活动公司 MARI 周一表示，该公司已收购 TodayTix Group (TTG)，从而获得其平台的使用权，这些平台销售从纽约歌剧到伦敦皇家莎士比亚剧团等各种现场演出的门票。【原文：Global events company MARI said on Monday it has acquired TodayTix Group (TTG), getting access to its platforms that sell tickets for live performances ranging from operas in New York to plays by London's Royal Shakespeare Company.】

item.title: 稳健的交易量将支撑美国交易所的业绩，泡沫喋喋不休成为焦点
item.description: 随着股票和期权交易量的强劲增长，美国主要交易所运营商将公布稳健的第三季度业绩报告。【原文：Major U.S. exchange operators are set to report a solid third quarter as robust trading in equities and options lifts volumes, a surge that has prompted some analysts to question whether parts of the market are in a bubble.】

item.title: Archer Aviation 与大韩航空就 eVTOL 空中出租车达成协议
item.description: Archer Aviation 周一表示，该公司与大韩航空（Korean Air）签署了一项合作协议，在韩国商业化其电动空中出租车，可能购买多达 100 架飞机。【原文：Archer Aviation on Monday said it signed a partnership with Korean Air to commercialize its electric air taxis in South Korea, with a potential purchase of up to 100 aircraft.】

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）局长称，由于太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）落后，美国将寻求竞争对手竞标阿耳特弥斯3号（Artemis 3
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的最高官员周一表示，美国航天局将开放阿耳特弥斯3号（Artemis 3）登月任务的合同，以便与SpaceX竞争，他说SpaceX的进度落后于计划。【原文：NASA's top official on Monday said the U.S. space agency was opening up the contract for its Artemis 3 moon mission to compete against SpaceX, which he said was running behind schedule.】

item.title: 莫尔森-科尔斯（Molson Coors）将在重组中裁减 9% 的美洲员工
item.description: 啤酒生产商莫尔森-科尔斯饮料公司（Molson Coors Beverage Company）周一表示，作为公司重组计划的一部分，该公司将在 12 月底之前在美洲业务部门裁员约 400 人，占员工总数的 9%。【原文：Beer maker Molson Coors Beverage Company said on Monday it would cut about 400 jobs, or 9% of the workforce, across its Americas business by the end of December as part of a corporate restructuring plan for the unit.】

item.title: Arm 扩展人工智能授权计划，提升设备上的人工智能市场份额
item.description: Arm Holdings 周一表示，它正在扩大其 "灵活接入"（Flexible Access）许可计划，以涵盖其 Armv9 边缘人工智能平台，旨在通过降低准入门槛和加快设计周期来吸引开发设备上人工智能的初创企业和设备制造商。【原文：Arm Holdings said on Monday it is expanding its Flexible Access licensing program to cover its Armv9 edge AI platform, aiming to attract startups and device makers developing on‑device AI by lowering entry barriers and accelerating design cycles.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商 CATL 第三季度利润增长加快
item.description: 中国电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 第三季度净利润增长加快，尽管它面临着来自较小竞争对手的更激烈竞争。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle battery giant CATL saw net profit growth accelerate in the third quarter, even as it faced increased competition from smaller rivals.】

item.title: 瑞波支持的 Evernorth 将在美国上市融资逾 10 亿美元，囤积 XRP 代币
item.description: 由数字资产公司瑞波（Ripple）支持的新加密企业 Evernorth 周一表示，将通过与空白支票公司 Armada Acquisition Corp II 合并的方式在纳斯达克上市，预计将募集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Evernorth, a new crypto venture backed by digital asset firm Ripple, said on Monday it will list on the Nasdaq through a merger with blank-check firm Armada Acquisition Corp II and is expected to raise more than $1 billion in proceeds.】

item.title: 来自美国和中国的大量白银缓解了伦敦现货市场的挤压
item.description: 交易商和分析师表示，过去一周，大量白银从美国和中国流向伦敦现货市场，缓解了全球最大场外贵金属交易中心的流动性紧张状况。【原文：Large flows of silver from the U.S. and China to London's spot market in the past week are easing a liquidity squeeze in the world's largest over-the-counter precious metals trading hub, traders and analysts said.】

item.title: 解说：为什么 Gucci 的所有者 Kering 要将其美容业务出售给欧莱雅？
item.description: 古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）已同意以 40 亿欧元（47 亿美元）的价格将其美容业务出售给欧莱雅集团（L'Oreal），这也是新任首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）的一次战略转移。【原文：Gucci-owner Kering has agreed to sell its beauty business to L'Oreal for 4 billion euros ($4.7 billion) in a strategic shift by new CEO Luca de Meo, who is trying to cut the luxury group's debt and refocus on its fashion business.】

item.title: 美国银行溃败引发交易猜测，信贷担忧迫在眉睫
item.description: 据四位业内资深人士透露，由于大买家可能会被刺激寻求吞并规模较小或实力较弱的竞争对手，因此围绕美国银行贷款损失风险的担忧加剧了对更多并购的预期。【原文：Jitters around U.S. banks' exposure to loan losses have fueled expectations for more mergers and acquisitions as big buyers may be spurred to look to absorb smaller or weaker rivals, according to four senior industry sources.】

item.title: 信贷风险引发恐慌，美国地区银行财报考验投资者神经
item.description: 本周，美国一些地区性银行出现了不良贷款和欺诈问题，投资者正等待这些银行发布更多的财报，以查看是否有迹象表明整个行业出现了更大范围的紧张。【原文：After a turbulent week in which some regional U.S. banks flagged bad loan and fraud issues, investors are now awaiting for more earnings reports from the lenders to check for signs of a wider strain across the sector.】
